remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此委托时，它可以将添加包含到指定的属性的 UI 项作为传递`valueUIItemList`参数。When this delegate is invoked, it can add a containing UI items for the specified property to the passed as the `valueUIItemList` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建提供的事件处理程序方法任何名为的属性的对象`HorizontalMargin`或`VerticalMargin`。This following code example demonstrates creating a event handler method that provides objects for any properties named `HorizontalMargin` or `VerticalMargin`.
